summary: Completed comprehensive testing of P1 features: i18n translations for SuperPinLeagueDetail.jsx and SuperPinMatch.jsx, and check-in system with 3 methods. All backend tests passed (15/15). Frontend UI working correctly with check-in tab visible on active leagues.

minor.issue: Backend model uses 'method' (singular) but frontend expects 'methods' (array). Frontend defaults to ['manual'] when methods not present, so functionality works but design mismatch exists.

issues: Only 'Manual' method button shows because league's checkin_config.methods is not configured as array. The component correctly defaults to ['manual'] but QR Code and Geolocation buttons won't appear unless backend provides methods array.

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues/{liga_id}/available-players - 200 OK
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues/{liga_id} returns league with checkin_config
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/players returns players list
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues/{liga_id}/checkin with manual method - 200 OK
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues/{liga_id}/checkout - 200 OK
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues/{liga_id}/checkin with qr_code method - 200 OK
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues/{liga_id}/checkin with geolocation without coords - 400 (correct validation)
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues/{liga_id}/checkin with geolocation with coords - 200/400 OK
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues/{liga_id}/matches - 200 OK
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues/{liga_id}/ranking - 200 OK
i18n: Spanish translations have all superpin.checkin keys
i18n: English translations have all superpin.checkin keys
i18n: Chinese translations have all superpin.checkin keys
i18n: SuperPinMatch.jsx translations verified in all 3 languages
i18n: SuperPinLeagueDetail.jsx translations verified in all 3 languages
Frontend: 'Player Check-in' tab appears on active league detail page
Frontend: Check-in component shows 'Manual' method button
Frontend: Player selection dropdown works with available players
Frontend: 'Check In' button performs check-in successfully
Frontend: 'Present Players' section updates after check-in
Frontend: 'Check Out' button works correctly
Frontend: SuperPinMatch.jsx shows all i18n labels (Back, Sets, Finished, Winner, Points, Set History, Match finished)
action_items: OPTIONAL: Update backend CheckInConfig model to support 'methods' array instead of single 'method' field to enable multiple check-in methods per league
critical_code_review_comments: Frontend SuperPinCheckIn.jsx expects checkin_config.methods (array) but backend provides checkin_config.method (string). Component handles this gracefully by defaulting to ['manual'].
The check-in system is fully functional - all 3 methods (manual, qr_code, geolocation) work via API, but UI only shows methods from the methods array.
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing Liga Demo 2025 (liga_01bc717ff842) with players Carlos and María.
context_for_next_testing_agent: P1 features fully tested: i18n translations complete for SuperPinLeagueDetail.jsx and SuperPinMatch.jsx in ES/EN/ZH. Check-in system working with all 3 methods via API. Active league: liga_01bc717ff842 (Liga Demo 2025). Players: Carlos (jugador_544167d88272), María. Match: spm_7caef0f13f31 (Carlos 2-1 María, finished). Note: To show QR Code and Geolocation buttons in UI, backend needs to provide checkin_config.methods as array.
